physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a street with mercantile buildings in the background and shops to the right of the photograph. People can be seen walking on the streets and there are peddlers who are sitting down on the ground as well. Baskets of foods have been placed on the ground and there are signs written in Chinese that are hung from the buildings.
